hero.title1: Grow sales with real usage, not promises.
hero.subtitle: Put your brand inside the grower's routine ‚Äî visible in tasks, photos and hard data.
hero.overline: We don‚Äôt just grow cultivars ‚Äî we grow your revenue.

journal.title: Seeds & breeders
journal.description: Live catalog in-app, up-to-date genetics and presence in the diary.

voice.title: Inputs & nutrients
voice.description: Your product line becomes phase-based tasks with tips, doses and proof of use.

alerts.title: Equipment
alerts.description: LEDs, tents, pots and more showing up in grow setups and daily tasks.

guides.title: Smart devices
guides.description: You build the hardware, we integrate it with the app.

appShowcase.title: How it works
appShowcase.subtitle: A simple, effective process to put your brand inside the grower‚Äôs routine.

dashboard.title: Step 1 ‚Äî Data that matters
dashboard.desc: Your feeding, pest or care chart becomes an interactive schedule in the app. The grower receives tasks at the right phase, with doses, tips and visual proof of use. You track adherence, drop-off and repurchase ‚Äî all aggregated and anonymous.

voice.title: Step 2 ‚Äî Useful, visible usage
voice.desc: Your brand appears naturally in tasks and the grow diary, with stickers on photos and videos.

qr.title: Step 3 ‚Äî Follow your influencers
qr.desc: See in real time how strategic profiles use your product, with stickers and unique codes to track sales.

alerts.title: Step 4 (optional) ‚Äî From label to app
alerts.desc: If you want, we can connect your packaging to the app via QR to take customers straight to your product‚Äôs schedule. Not required to start.

sponsorship.title: Cannabis marketing is locked down, we unlock it with real data.
sponsorship.subtitle: Ad restrictions, shallow metrics and campaigns that never become routine. MyBud puts your brand at the exact moment of the grow, inside the app the grower opens every day, and delivers actionable data on the real use of your products.

stats.title: We‚Äôre after numbers that matter
stats.description: With a grow-focused app available in three languages from day one, we‚Äôre set to scale. We‚Äôre looking for partnerships that create real impact ‚Äî here are the numbers we expect to hit together.*
stats.note: *Projections based on early tests and potential market size.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to get you started.

q0.q: What data and insights will I receive?
q0.a: Adherence to schedule, drop-off, repurchase, visual proof and aggregated metrics to guide decisions.

q1.q: How does the brand appear and get measured?
q1.a: Inside phase-based tasks, public diaries and profile showcases. We track adherence, drop-off, repurchase and visual proof ‚Äî always aggregated and anonymous.

q2.a: Yes. Tech sheet, videos, tips and schedules aligned with your product line.

q3.q: How does public grower sponsorship work?
q3.a: You pick strategic profiles. Your brand shows in their posts and tasks with stickers. Real-time monitoring of usage.

q4.a: We can work exclusivity by period and category in strategic agreements.

q5.q: Can I track sales or leads?
q5.a: We deliver UTMs and coupons for attribution plus repurchase reports when applicable.
